summary: zHealth provides an all-in-one, web-based commerce platform for wellness providers like chiropractors, physical therapists, and massage therapists to digitize operations, manage scheduling, notes, billing, payments, and enhance patient experience.

ChiroTouch provides chiropractic EHR and practice management software designed to manage all aspects of a practice from a single platform, including scheduling, charting, billing, patient engagement, compliance, and reporting. They offer cloud-based solutions for various practice types.

zHealthEHR is an all-in-one, 100% cloud-based electronic health record (EHR) software designed specifically for chiropractic providers. It features customizable SOAP notes, patient scheduling, integrated billing, online appointments, text reminders, and dictation capabilities.

ChiroCat offers an all-in-one, cloud-based practice management software specifically designed for chiropractors. It includes features like EHR, intuitive scheduling, HIPAA-compliant two-way messaging, billing, online booking, custom intake forms, automated patient review solicitation, and Text-to-Pay, aiming to streamline practice operations for a single monthly fee.

Medical Billers and Coders (MBC) provides specialized medical billing and coding services for various practices, including chiropractic, across the USA with a focus on California. They aim to optimize revenue cycles, ensure compliance, reduce claim denials, and manage administrative burdens for healthcare providers by leveraging expertise and integrating with various EMR/billing software.

ClinicMind provides a comprehensive platform for practice owners, offering solutions like EHR (both cloud-based and PC-based), RCM, patient experience tools (portals, telehealth, virtual front desk), billing services, credentialing, payment processing, and compliance support, particularly catering to healthcare professionals and chiropractic practices.

PracticeStudio by MicroFour, Inc. is a certified Electronic Health Record (EHR) and practice management software solution specifically designed for the Chiropractic industry. It combines EHR functionalities like charting (SOAP notes, touch-screen interface), ePrescribing, lab integration, and patient portal with practice management tools such as appointment scheduling, billing (eClaims, remittance processing), messaging, and reporting. The system supports mobile devices and aims to streamline workflows, improve patient care, ensure compliance (including Meaningful Use Stage 2), and maximize practice profitability for chiropractic practices of all sizes.
ClinicSense is a cloud-based practice management software designed for chiropractors, helping manage patient appointments, SOAP notes, billing, and communication.

Spark Chiropractic specializes in gentle chiropractic care using the Activator Method. Located in Noe Valley, San Francisco, and run by Jenny Proenza, DC, the practice offers services for various conditions including joint pain, flexibility restoration, posture correction, stress management, and prenatal care (Webster Technique-certified). Care is provided for people of all ages.

User-friendly and powerful software to expand healthcare practices by boosting patient visits, decreasing staff workload, and maximizing billing profits. Designed to help doctors save time, includes features like online scheduling, online intake, virtual front desk, SOAP notes, billing/ERA reconciliation, advanced reporting, care plans, time clock, and user earnings tracking. Suitable for practices of any size.

Advanced and reliable chiropractic software for automating administrative work, including patient intake, insurance verification, and payment processing. It is fully web-based with an intuitive interface and offers integrations for billing and patient processing. Provides personal account managers, one-on-one training, and data transfer services.

CureMD is amongst the largest providers of healthcare oriented software based in the US. Founded in 1997 by Bilal Hashmat, he is the current CEO of this firm as well. CureMD currently has around 600-1000 employees in its team, with nearly 25% of its employees dedicated for customer service.

Practice EHR provides a cloud-based EHR and practice management solution suitable for any medical specialty and practice size. It aims to consolidate practice tasks like check-in, scheduling, billing, and claims into a single, intuitive workflow, enhanced with AI tools and a mobile app (PracticeEHR Go).

24/7 Medical Billing Services provides comprehensive outsourced medical billing and coding services, specializing in various fields including chiropractic billing for practices in San Francisco, CA and across the US. They focus on optimizing revenue cycles, reducing claim denials, and ensuring compliance, aiming to enhance collections by up to 20%.

24/7 Medical Billing Services provides outsourced medical billing and coding solutions, with a specific focus on Chiropractic Billing Services for practices in California. They aim to increase reimbursements, reduce operational costs, manage Accounts Receivables, and ensure compliance with standards like ICD-10, HIPAA, and LCD guidelines. They offer expertise across multiple medical specialties and various practice management software platforms.

MediBillMD offers specialized chiropractic medical billing services designed to handle coding, claims, payments, denial management, and A/R recovery for chiropractic practices nationwide. They aim to improve collection rates (claiming 96%), increase revenue, and reduce administrative burdens for clinics of all sizes.

ChiroTouch offers an all-in-one chiropractic practice management software platform, including EHR, billing (insurance and cash), compliance, and patient engagement solutions. Key features include patient management dashboards, rapid SOAP notes, integrated clearinghouse for claims management, cloud-based access, online scheduling, and real-time reporting dashboards.

ChiroBill offers specialized insurance billing, collections, and patient account services tailored for Chiropractors, Physical Therapists, and Speech Therapists, primarily serving California. With over two decades of experience, they focus on maximizing reimbursement through accurate coding, electronic billing, and minimizing claim rejections.

EmdeonMD LLC offers specialized chiropractic billing services focused on optimizing revenue for chiropractic practices. Their services include accurate claims submission, expertise in chiropractic codes (ICD-10, HCPCS), proactive denial management, insurance verification, detailed documentation, and timely follow-ups to maximize reimbursements and ensure regulatory compliance.

products: Cost Effective IT Equipment and Services
summary: Right Medical Billing offers specialized Chiropractic medical billing services designed to handle complex coding, ensure timely billing and follow-up, manage accounts receivable, and maximize reimbursement. Their services include eligibility verification, charge entry, billing and analysis, AR follow-up, denial management, payment posting, and provider credentialing. They work with various billing software and cater to different types of healthcare providers.

HMS USA LLC provides specialized chiropractic billing services aimed at maximizing reimbursements and reducing errors. They offer comprehensive revenue cycle management, including insurance credentialing, front office support, claim scrubbing, denial resolution, and payment posting, leveraging expertise in chiropractic CPT coding and documentation.

zHealthEHR provides a cloud-based, all-in-one practice management software designed for wellness practices, especially chiropractors. Key features include EHR, scheduling, automated reminders, patient check-in options, customizable SOAP notes with dictation, integrated billing, and reporting.

PracticeHub is described as an all-in-one clinic platform specifically designed for chiropractors. It offers features like scheduling, custom treatment notes, client billing, patient retention tools, automation workflows, paperless records, reporting, and integrations to streamline practice management.

Practice Better is an all-in-one EHR and practice management software designed for private and group health and wellness practices, helping professionals grow their business, automate tasks, and deliver holistic health care.
FreeCHIRO is a Silicon Valley founded Technology Company dedicated to providing the chiropractic community with awesome software and even better support.
Zocdoc is an online platform allowing patients to find nearby doctors who accept their insurance, read patient reviews, and book appointments instantly online.

Headway is building a new mental healthcare system that everyone can access. We make it easy for people to find quality in-network mental health care by removing historic barriers faced by mental health providers, payers, and patients.
Kareo.com is a company that offers innovative software solutions for healthcare providers to efficiently manage their practices, streamline billing processes, and enhance patient care.
Unable to access the content from the provided URL because it is subscriber-only.
A women’s health company making personalized reproductive health information and laboratory tests, previously confined to fertility clinics, more accessible for women at home.

ChiroTouch provides practice management software and related services including patient engagement, intake forms, payment processing, billing services, and claims integration, tailored for the chiropractic profession. They partner with various experts and organizations in the chiropractic field.

Notable Labs is building a personalized drug discovery platform to identify treatment options for relapsed and refractory cancer patients — starting with blood cancer. They test combinations of FDA approved drugs on a person's actual cancer cells using a highly automated lab run on custom software.

Align Chiropractic Practice Management System is an ONC-ATCB Certified, 100% cloud-based software offering integrated practice management and revenue cycle management for chiropractic clinics. It features tools for documentation (like 15-second SOAP notes), billing, scheduling, patient communication, and reporting, supporting multiple specialties and locations.

products: NextGen® Closed Loop™ Patient & Practice Experience
summary: NextGen Healthcare provides cloud-based EHR, Practice Management, Revenue Cycle Management, Interoperability (Mirth), and other healthcare IT solutions primarily for ambulatory and specialty practices, leveraging AI and automation to improve outcomes and efficiency.

ChiroTouch offers cloud-based chiropractic practice management software. CT MaxClear is an add-on product for ChiroTouch Advanced customers, providing integrated claims processing and clearinghouse services through Change Healthcare. It aims to automate billing workflows, track claims, post payments efficiently, and reduce claim rework.

NextGen Healthcare provides integrated Practice Management (PM) solutions designed to optimize financial performance, operations, and efficiency for medical practices. Their offerings, including versions for larger (NextGen Enterprise) and smaller (NextGen Office) practices, feature tools like an AI Rules Engine for claims, billing management, clearinghouse/EDI connectivity, coding support, collections/AR management, and scheduling. The goal is to increase collections, reduce days in A/R, ensure billing accuracy, and streamline workflows.

EZBIS provides chiropractic-specific practice management and electronic health records (EHR) software solutions. Key features include patient accounting and billing, EHR, appointment scheduling with automated reminders, online scheduling, insurance auto-posting, credit card processing, inventory control, patient portal, and a patient self-check-in app. The company emphasizes its modular design, customer support, and experience serving chiropractors since 1980.

Informational webpage provided by Noridian Healthcare Solutions, a Medicare Administrative Contractor (MAC) for Jurisdiction E Part B. The page details Medicare coverage, billing guidelines, documentation requirements, excluded services, and resources specifically for chiropractic providers.
Could not retrieve content from the page due to a server error (Mod_Security block).

Zingit offers chiropractic software designed for practice growth by automating patient communication and administrative tasks. It aims to improve front desk efficiency, attract new patients, and enhance patient engagement through tools like automated reminders, 2-way texting, online scheduling, web chat, reputation management, and EHR integrations.

products: Chiropractic Clinic Patient Check-in Kiosk System
summary: Atlas ChiroSys provides an all-in-one chiropractor software meticulously custom built for chiropractors. It handles various aspects of a chiropractic business, including scheduling, patient notes, check-in systems, billing, automated reminders (text, patient), rescheduling, CRM, and clinic management.

products: RAPID EHR and Practice Management Software
summary: ACOM Health provides chiropractic specific Insurance Billings and Collections with free RAPID EHR and Practice Management Software. The Billing and Collections services manages all Insurance type claims, follow-up, and postings.

NMCI Medical Clinic provides chiropractic care, defined as 'to be done by hand'. Chiropractors specialize in manual adjustments to the skeletal system, mainly the spine, to restore normal function and offer non-intrusive pain management. The process involves consultation, X-rays to assess the area and safety, followed by a series of adjustments using moderate pressure to realign the skeletal system, reduce pain, and improve comfort and mobility.

Gibson Chiropractic, led by Dr. Chris S. Gibson, offers a comprehensive range of chiropractic care services in Sacramento, CA, and surrounding areas. They focus on treating various conditions (back pain, headaches, injuries, etc.) and promoting wellness through personalized, patient-oriented care and advanced techniques.

Better Health Chiropractic is a clinic located in Rocklin, CA, established in 1993, providing chiropractic care for families. They focus on integrating functional neurology, neuro-nutrition, and sports science, treating conditions from pediatric issues (tongue ties, developmental delays) to adult concerns (neuropathy, nerve damage, balance problems, concussions, knee pain) using a personalized, brain-based approach.

Livingston Chiropractic Clinic provides chiropractic care and related therapeutic services in Livingston, CA. They offer personalized treatment plans tailored to individual needs for conditions like pain, auto injuries, and sports injuries, utilizing adjustments, various massage types, cryotherapy, electrical stimulation, and therapeutic exercises. They also conduct DOT/DMV physicals and drug/alcohol testing.
We connect attorneys with our experienced personal injury chiropractors and other professional healthcare providers across Southern California

Sutter Health is a healthcare network operating in Northern California. It provides access to a network of doctors and clinicians, including chiropractors, across various locations. They offer services like finding doctors, booking appointments, virtual care, urgent care, and a patient portal called My Health Online for managing appointments, messaging doctors, and viewing test results.

Movement Chiropractic and Wellness provides chiropractic care, soft-tissue management, and functional rehabilitation services. They utilize various techniques like Adjustments, Rock Tape, RockBlades, Active Release Techniques, and Functional Movement Screens to help patients improve.

ECLIPSE offers Chiropractic EHR, Billing, and Practice Management software. It comes in two versions: ECLIPSE EHR Cloud, a web-based subscription accessible via any browser, and ECLIPSE, a desktop software for Windows PCs and networks (standalone or Client/Server). The software serves Chiropractic, Physical Therapy, and Medical facilities, scaling from single practitioners to large multi-site practices, handling documentation, scheduling, billing, and patient communication.

zHealthEHR offers web-based practice management and EHR software for health & wellness practices, including chiropractors. Features include online scheduling, automated reminders, digital patient intake (tablet/online forms), SOAP notes with voice-to-text, integrated electronic billing, patient recall automation, and review management (Review Plus). Managed billing services are also offered.

ChiroHD provides a cloud-based Electronic Health Record (EHR) and practice management software specifically designed for chiropractic clinics. It aims to simplify clinic operations, including scheduling, charting, patient engagement via a dedicated app, and reporting, running entirely within a web browser.

CareCloud provides cloud-based healthcare solutions including medical billing services, EHR, practice management, and revenue cycle management, aimed at enhancing financial performance, patient care, and operational efficiency for medical practices. Their California-focused medical billing services emphasize claim optimization, denial reduction, and reimbursement maximization.

Offers outsourced medical billing services tailored for chiropractic practices, specifically targeting the San Francisco, CA area. The service aims to increase collections (citing an average increase from 61% to 72% of total billings), handle data entry, claim submissions, follow-ups on delinquent accounts and rejected claims, allowing practices to focus on patient care. They state that services can be tailored to the size and budget of the practice.

Formerly Midwife’s Billing Service, Inc., Innovation Billing Service, Inc. is a midwife-owned company specializing in medical billing, coding, contracting, practice management, and consulting services. It focuses on serving midwives, birth centers, women and family medicine providers, and independent practitioners. The company utilizes the AdvancedMD platform and offers related training and support.

Chiro8000 provides chiropractic software solutions including simplified billing, practice management, and certified EHR. Their products aim to connect billing, scheduling, practice management, marketing, EMR/EHR, communication, patient education, and collections to enhance practice efficiency and growth. They emphasize simplicity and value for chiropractic practices.

products: RAPID - Chiropractic EHR and Practice Management Software
summary: ACOM Health’s RAPID is a web-based chiropractic EHR and practice management software designed to increase productivity and efficiency. It offers features like automated EHR workflow, intuitive charting, customizable templates, automated billing codes, and intelligent alerts for medical necessity and patient progress.

ChiroTouch offers EHR and practice management software specifically designed for chiropractic practices. Their solutions aim to streamline workflows, enhance patient experience, and support growth through scalable, cloud-based tools and automation features. They provide various modules for scheduling, charting, billing, patient engagement, intake forms, payment processing, billing services, and claims integration.

Agile Occupational Medicine offers a range of occupational health services, specializing in chiropractic care, physical therapy, employee screenings, injury treatment, and workers' compensation programs. They emphasize non-invasive treatments and customized return-to-work, prevention, and industry-specific solutions for employers.
